name: Starmony
description:
Every ten seconds a star is born. A rainbow-themed musical arcade game created for Ludum Dare 51.

Controls:
Launch star: Z or /
Increase launch speed: hold Z or /
Use paddles: Space

Credits:
Jeremy House: Code, design
Ben Kalman: Code, design, sound, music (composed for this jam)
Gwen C. Katz: Art, animation, design
